alert.note: Alert for Lowndes; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 10:57PM CST until January 03 at 11:30PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Noxubee County in east central Mississippi... Southern Lowndes County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 1130 PM CST. * At 1057 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Macon, or 16 miles west of Pickensville, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbus, Macon, Brooksville, Crawford, Prairie Point, Deerbrook and Bigbee Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
